title: Roasted Spring Onions
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Place onions in a baking pan. Sprinkle with thyme and season with salt and pepper. Add butter in slivers, especially around bulbs. Roast onions until tender, browned, and caramelized, about 35 minutes. Transfer to a warmed bowl and drizzle with pan juices.
ingredients: 15 baby Vidalia onions or other large-bulb spring onion
